## Checklist

- [ ] Branch name follows convention (for example: `feat/my-change`)
- [ ] I ran `ruff check .`
- [ ] I ran `pytest -q`
- [ ] I added/updated tests for behavior changes
- [ ] I updated docs/README for user-facing changes
- [ ] No secrets or credentials are included
- [ ] CI is passing
